meanings.definition: To introduce an acetyl group into a compound.
meanings.sent1: She acetylated the molecule to change its properties.
meanings.sent2: The scientist acetylated the substance to study its effects.
meanings.sent3: The chemistry student acetylated the solution and accidentally turned it purple!
meanings.sent4: His experiments acetylated the field of organic chemistry, revolutionizing it.
meanings.sent5: The process of acetylating can be complex but yields interesting results.

meanings.definition: To treat with acetic acid or acetic anhydride.
meanings.sent1: The chef acetylated the vegetables to enhance their flavor.
meanings.sent2: They acetylated the fabric to make it water-resistant.
meanings.sent3: The prankster acetylated the cake, giving it a tangy surprise!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity acetylated the mundane task, making it more enjoyable.
meanings.sent5: Acetylating the wood preserved it for years to come.
